      • getCurrencyHistory

        public java.util.Map<java.util.Date,java.lang.Double> getCurrencyHistory(UserHolding userHolding)
                                                                  throws com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException,
                                                                         java.io.IOException
        Fetches the currency history for a CryptoCurrency/Fiat
        Parameters:
        userHolding - The Holding's history to fetch
        Returns:
        A Map of Currency history with the key of Dates rounded to the nearest instance of 0:00am with their total value for that date as a boxed Double
        Throws:
        com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException
        java.io.IOException

      • getNextTrackedTransaction

        Formats the queue passing over "watch" Transactions (where their quantity is 0)
        Parameters:
        queue - The queue to be searched
        Returns:
        The Transaction Queue after passing any 0 quantity Transactions

        Returns the currency value at a specified date
        Parameters:
